definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Fixed Plague Javelin to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 確實用縮寫名籤武器損壞固定的災害標槍。
“因陀羅的標槍”經過一個圓形的“反射體”而運作。

sentences.english: Helen is very good at throwing the javelin and Mary is very good at running.
sentences.chinese: 海倫很擅長標槍，瑪麗則長於跑步。

sentences.english: Javelin Soldier IFVs are a very good anti-vehicle, anti-air, and anti-building unit.
sentences.chinese: 標槍兵IFV是非常好的反裝甲，防空，反建築單位。

sentences.english: We quickly picked up our javelins and spears and we ran at theJebusites.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我們迅速撿起標槍與魚叉，衝向更多的敵人。

sentences.english: Dismounted, they make solid infantry armed with light spears.
sentences.chinese: 步行波蘭貴族騎兵熱衷步戰廝殺，使用標槍作戰。

sentences.english: The most common injuries in javelin throw training were elbow joint throw.
sentences.chinese: 標槍訓練中最常見的創傷主要是肘關節損傷。

sentences.english: And in landing, the tip of the metal head must strike the ground before any other part of the javelin.
sentences.chinese: 標槍在着地時，金屬槍尖應先於槍的其它部位觸地。

sentences.english: Armed with a javelin and most often fighting unarmoured , their preferred tactic is to hit and run.
sentences.chinese: 泰利突騎兵裝備標槍，通常輕裝上陣，極擅游擊戰術。

sentences.english: For Lightning Enchanted Monsters, it's best to throw Javelins at them rather than using your melee Jab attack.
sentences.chinese: 對付閃電強化的怪，使用標槍比近身使用戳刺更有效。

sentences.english: Javelin requires skill and is difficult to master.
sentences.chinese: 擲標槍技術性強，掌握它難度較大。

sentences.english: Of the five gold medals, one was from Men’s Javelin and the remaining four were from water sports.
sentences.chinese: 五枚金牌中一枚是男子標槍，其他四枚都是水上項目。

sentences.english: It resembled a short bar of iron, pointed like a pike at one end.
sentences.chinese: 好象是根短鐵釺，一端磨到和標槍一般尖。

sentences.english: I agree with you on the pilum thingy.
sentences.chinese: 關於特製標槍很無力的觀點我同意。

sentences.english: Fixed Poison Javelin to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 確實用縮寫名籤武器損壞固定的毒藥標槍。

definition: to charge and break through enemy lines
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
to attack with a bladed weapon
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
